web_snippets: Maria Foscarinis ... Foscarinis has advocated for solutions to homelessness at the national level since 1985. She is a primary architect of the McKinney-Vento ...
Maria Foscarinis is the founder of the National Homelessness Law Center (formerly known as the National Law Center on Homelessness & Poverty)
Maria Foscarinis has challenged the exclusion of homeless people from the freedoms and protections that apply to everyone.
